questions.q: What makes The Hermetic Flight Aerial Tarot Deck different from other tarot decks?
questions.a:
The Hermetic Flight combines the transformative art of aerial performance with traditional tarot symbolism in a way no deck has done before. Each card features real aerial artists captured in movement, creating a living embodiment of tarot archetypes. Unlike generic photographic decks, our imagery is intentionally choreographed to reflect traditional Rider-Waite-Smith symbolism while introducing fresh visual metaphors through bodies suspended in airâ€”representing the liminal space where divination happens.

Key differentiators include 21 professional aerial performers and 100% human-created photography. All cards feature real humans, photographed and edited by David Horvitz.

questions.q: Is this deck suitable for beginners?
questions.a: Absolutely. The Hermetic Flight was designed with beginners in mind while remaining valuable for experienced readers. The aerial imagery provides intuitive visual stories that help new readers understand card meanings without pure memorization.

questions.q: Will this deck work if I'm already familiar with Rider-Waite-Smith?
questions.a: Yes! The Hermetic Flight honors traditional RWS symbolism while introducing aerial metaphors that deepen familiar meanings. If you know RWS, you'll immediately recognize the archetypal structures.
